block.title: MITRE ATT&CK App for Splunk - Initial Setup
block.text:
This setup page provides configuration options for API integration and Lookup Generating searches.

You can find more information on https://api.seynur.com

For a quick start simply hit Save button to continue

Note: "Get Attack Detection Rules" search tries to connect to API gateway

block.title: Enable/Disable API and Lookup generating searches.
block.text: These are saved searches and can also be modified via Settings after setup.

block.title: Configure Cron Schedule
block.text: Only applicable if enabled. These are saved searches and can also be modified via Settings after setup.
